nodes.text: The Lambda sector was a sector in the Mid Rim, neighboring the Dufilvian sector. Planets in Lambda included Rintonne and Xandil VII, as well as a number of heavy industrial worlds and ship construction centers.
Between 57 BBY and 39 BBY, the sector was the site of the Andoan Wars.

The Lambda sector was represented in the Galactic Senate by Rasit Brun at the time of the Separatist Crisis. The sector split in two during the Clone Wars. The systems located along the two major hyperlanes joined the Separatists.

Under the Galactic Empire, the sector was governed by Moff Par Lankin. Following the Battle of Endor, the Lambda sector was among the first sectors to throw off the Empire. However, Moff Lankin became one of the many Imperial warlords, keeping the sector under control and making Rintonne his fortress world.
During the Nagai–Tof War, the Nagai crossed the Lambda sector, defeating Moff Lankin's forces on their way.
The sector was liberated when the New Republic defeated warlord Par Lankin in 7 ABY.
In 9 ABY, Grand Admiral Thrawn reconquered all the systems located along the two major hyperlanes of the sector, including the planets Ando, Mon Gazza, Thape and the Algaran system.
During the Yuuzhan Vong War, only a small part of the Lambda sector was invaded.
